May 9, 1970 D North Eastern Area (Championship Section)
Yorkshire Area (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire Area yorkshire-area-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)

The Corsair
Leeds Town Hall, Leeds, West Yorkshire, England, UK 7 bands competed. Black Dyke and Brighouse and Rastrick had prequalified and not required to compete.
